textTemplates.name: InvestmentTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear Approver,


I'm pleased to inform you that the applicant has submitted their investment form details.


Kindly review the submitted information as necessary.


Best regards,

Golden Planet

textTemplates.name: KYCstatussubmit
textTemplates.text:
Dear Approver,


This is to bring to your attention that the applicant has submitted the KYC (Know Your Customer) details for your review and approval.


Kindly do the needful at your earliest.


Best regards,

Golden Planet

textTemplates.name: paymentEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear Finance User,


I wanted to inform you that the applicant has submitted their payment details.


Kindly ensure that the payment is processed and recorded accordingly.


Best regards,
